FAQ Section.Layout: Single-column layout transitioning to multi-column (2 or 3 columns) on larger screens.
FAQ Section.Design: Clean and organized with a central heading followed by a grid of questions and answers.

Key Elements.Heading: Centrally-aligned, bold heading to introduce the FAQ section.
Key Elements.Introductory Text: Centrally-aligned paragraph providing context or additional information.
Key Elements.Questions and Answers: Grid layout with each question highlighted by a slightly larger font size and bold text, followed by descriptive text.

FAQ Section.Use Cases: Ideal for product pages, service-oriented websites, and any site requiring an FAQ section to address common questions and concerns of users.
